review_text: Bought the new Lego City set for my 7-year-old and he absolutely loves it! The instructions were clear, all pieces were present, and the quality is excellent as always. Quick delivery from the store too!
The dollhouse itself is sturdy and beautiful, my daughter was thrilled. However, the assembly took longer than expected due to unclear diagrams. Once built, it's a great toy.
This remote control truck is fast and durable! We've taken it off-road a few times and it handles bumps and grass easily. Battery life is decent, but we bought an extra for continuous play.
The puzzle picture is gorgeous and the pieces fit well. Disappointed that one corner piece was missing, which is a common issue, but still frustrating for a 1000-piece set.
Love these sensory blocks! They are soft, easy to grip for little hands, and the different textures and sounds keep my 1-year-old entertained. Highly recommend for early development.

review_summary: Cool figure, wish it had more articulation
review_text: The sculpt and paint job are amazing. It looks great on display, but for actual play, the articulation is a bit limited compared to other figures in the same price range.
This strategy board game is a hit with my family. It's complex enough for adults but easy to teach to older kids. The components are high quality.
You can't go wrong with a classic wooden train set. This one connects perfectly with other major brands and is very well made. Will last for years.
The slime kit was a disappointment. It was incredibly messy, stained my table, and the final product was more of a sticky liquid than actual slime, even after following the instructions carefully.
Great scooter for my teenager. It feels solid and the ride is smooth. Lost one star because the folding mechanism is a little stiff initially.
